title: Senior project manager
skills:
I speak fluent English and Spanish. Written and spoken language
Lived and studied abroad for more than 10 years. USA, Argentina, Sweden, France.
Professional sportsman until 2007. Sports - tennis. Member of the junior teams of Moscow. Champion of Moscow in category under 18 years. 2-times bronze medalist of the Russian championship in category under 18 years. Bronze medalist of the Russian team championship in category under 16 as a member of the Luzhniki team. Participant and prize-winner of international tournaments of the ITF series.
I'm fond of football, chess, history, geography, literature, politics, world news
Purposeful and practical

primary.name: Moscow Chernomyrdin State Open University, Moscow

industries.name: Commercial Property Construction (Retail Spaces, Office Buildings)

experience.description:
Responsible for delivering key PDS projects in Moscow
Responsible for leading and overviewing PDS projects realized by other project managers 
- Development and approval of project delivery strategy
- Getting all project related approvals from client and stakeholders
- Development of detailed project program/schedule
- Development of detailed project budget
- Collecting all the project initiation documents
- Ensuring best value is obtained for the project including supplier base, use of internal and external resources.
- Maintaining and completing Project Key Performance Indicators.
- Writing detailed and summarized project progress reports.
- Identifying, costing and processing any contract variations.
- Tracking activities against the detailed project plans.
- Updating project plans to include agreed changes.
- Producing accurate financial reports.
- Monitoring actual expenditure figures against project budgets.
- Organizing and chairing Project meetings.
- Performing project close out reports and chairing lessons learned meetings

Projects delivered in current role:
 - LEGO Moscow headquarters - 1200sq.m
 - KraftHeinz Moscow headquarters - 100sq.m
 - SAMSUNG Moscow showroom - 600sq.m
 - DDX Fitness Moscow Mytischi Moscow - 2600sq.m
 - DDX Fitness Moscow Zhulebino Moscow - 1500sq.m
 - DDX Fitness Moscow Moskvorechye Moscow- 1600sq.m
 - DDX Fitness Moscow Rostokino - 2400sq.m
 - DDX Fitness Moscow Konkovo - 1300sq.m
 - DDX Fitness Moscow Sofiya - 1100sq.m

Ongoing projects in current role:
 - BASF Moscow headquarters - 4200sq.m
 - Brystol Myers Squibb Moscow headquarters - 2300sq.m
 - DDX Fitness Moscow Angara - 1200sq.m
 - DDX Fitness Moscow Ekran - 1100sq.m
 - DDX Fitness Moscow Khimki - 1100sq.m
 - DDX Fitness Moscow Budapest - 1300sq.m
 - DDX Fitness Moscow Baykonur - 1200sq.m

industries.name: Commercial Property Construction (Retail Spaces, Office Buildings)

experience.description:
- Responsible for costing, estimating and planning projects.
- Preparing Project Initiation documentation.
- Responsible for ensuring best value is obtained for the project including supplier base, use of internal and external resources.
- Maintaining and completing Project Key Performance Indicators.
- Writing detailed and summarized project progress reports.
- Identifying, costing and processing any contract variations.
- Tracking activities against the detailed project plans.
- Updating project plans to include agreed changes.
- Producing accurate financial reports.
- Monitoring actual expenditure figures against project budgets.
- Organizing and leading Project meetings.

- Operational management of the company (350 workers, 61 people of engineering)
- Implementation of Fit-out projects from "0" to commissioning.
- Coordination of the work of the company's subdivisions. 
- Control of the cost, quality and timing of project work.
- Control over the execution of budgets of Fit-out projects.
- Development and control over execution of work schedules and project financing schedules. (MS Project)
- Organization and control over the work of the tender commission for the selection of suppliers and contractors. Preparation of technical specifications for the tender.
- Analysis of the reliability of the counterparty, risk assessment.
- Work on cost optimization, material reconfiguration, preparation of MAF and COR.
- Analysis and approval of all contracts with counterparties. Control of reference points.
- Management and control over the work of contractors and company services to ensure the necessary timing and quality of work.
- Supervision of construction site, implementation of design projects, control over commissioning.
- Interaction with designers and architects to develop and create project documentation.
- Control over the release and delivery of the project documentation to the customer.
- Planning and allocation of resources for projects.
- Strategic planning.
- Negotiations and interaction with customers.

Today the company is a leader in Fit-out segment of the market.

Main realized projects:
- "Tele-2" office - 12000m2;
- "SIBUR" office - 8000m2;
- AZIMUT Hotel "Vladivostok" reconstruction - 15000m2;
- AZIMUT Hotel "Belgrade" reconstruction - 20000m2
- "ERCAFARM" office - 1000m2
- "Sysmex" production area - 1000m2
- "Only" residential complex (apartments) - 8000m2
- "Heart of the Capital" residential complex - 3000m2

industries.name: Commercial Property Construction (Retail Spaces, Office Buildings)

experience.position: Head of procurement and logistics department
experience.description:
- Building up procurement department.
- Complex material and technical support of the company's building facilities on the territory of the Russian Federation.
- Planning and budgeting of procurement activities.
- Analysis of the market of Russian and foreign suppliers, holding tenders, negotiating to obtain better conditions (price, quality, timing), contract conclusion and control.
- Organization of deliveries of materials and equipment to construction sites, management of warehouse and transport logistics.
- Participation in consideration and coordination of changes in project decisions arising during the course of work; making decisions on the replacement of materials / products / structures to reduce costs. Preparing MAF, COR.
- Analysis of counterparties, risk assessment.
- Interaction with the project, legal, budget, financial and other divisions of the company.
- Participation in the development of work schedule.
- Risk assessment of the use of certain finishing materials in terms of quality and delivery time.
- Development of forms of contracts for procurement activities.
- Control over the fulfillment of contractual obligations by suppliers and subcontractors.
- Preparation of technical specifications for the conclusion of contracts
- Organization of work with documents, accounting and reporting.

industries.name: Marketing, Advertising, Designer, Event and PR Agencies

experience.description: Organization of the work of the department of cultural events, personnel management. Implementation of projects on a turn-key basis. Support and organization of VIP guests in Moscow, in particular, the football teams "Real Madrid", "Milan", "PSV", the delegation of the football club "Barcelona", as well as the stars of the show business.
Organization of public, social and corporate events. Compilation and approval of estimates, communication with foreign partners, personnel management.
